alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Marathon; Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Oneida; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 12:20AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of Forest, southern Florence, eastern Marathon, northern Marinette, southeastern Oneida, Menominee, northern Oconto, Langlade and western Shawano Counties through 130 AM CDT... At 1219 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Crandon to 6 miles east of Antigo to near Wittenberg. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Antigo, Crandon, Kingsford, Wittenberg, Mountain, Goodman, White Lake, Homestead, Fern and Parrish. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Florence; Forest; Langlade; Marathon; Menominee; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Oneida; Shawano; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
